00063 enum Direction {
00064   kDuplex = 0,
00065   kReceive,
00066   kSend,
00067   kDisable
00068 };
00069 
00070 typedef std::vector< std::pair<JoinableWeakPtr, Direction> > JoinableVector;
00071 typedef std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<JoinableStream> > JoinableStreamVector;

00085 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00086 class Joinable {
00087  public:
00088 
00089   typedef jsr309::Direction Direction;
00090 
00092   virtual ~Joinable() {}
00093 
00102   virtual bool Join(Direction direction,
00103                     const JoinableWeakPtr& joinee) = 0;
00104 
00113   virtual bool Unjoin(const JoinableWeakPtr& joinee) = 0;
00114 
00122   virtual JoinableVector GetJoinees() = 0;
00123   virtual const JoinableVector& GetJoinees() const = 0;
00124   
00145   virtual JoinableVector GetJoinees(Direction direction) const = 0;
00146 
00147 }; // class Joinable
00148 
00158 class JoinableStream : public virtual Joinable { 
00159  public:
00160 
00161 
00163   typedef enum {
00164     kAudio = 0,
00165     kVideo
00166   } StreamType;
00167 
00169   virtual ~JoinableStream() {}
00170 
00172   virtual StreamType type() const = 0;
00173 
00181   virtual bool SetRemoteOffer(const MediaConfig& offer) = 0;
00182 
00190   virtual bool SetRemoteAnswer(const MediaConfig& answer) = 0;
00191 
00200   virtual bool SetLocalOffer(const MediaConfig& offer) = 0;
00201 
00210   virtual bool SetLocalAnswer(const MediaConfig& answer) = 0;
00211 
00213   virtual const JoinableContainer& container() const = 0;
00214 
00215 }; // class JoinableStream
00216 
00227 class JoinableContainer : public virtual MediaObject, public virtual Joinable {
00228  public:
00229 
00231   virtual ~JoinableContainer() {}
00232

00242                                   JoinableStreamWeakPtr& outptr) = 0;
